code:
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic shift_ena,
    input logic count_ena,
    input logic data,
    output logic [3:0] q
);

logic [3:0] shift_reg;

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (shift_ena) begin
        shift_reg <= {data, shift_reg[3:1]}; // Shift in data MSB first
    end else if (count_ena) begin
        shift_reg <= shift_reg - 1; // Decrement the register value
    end
end

assign q = shift_reg;

endmodule
